vsParam:
Got it, that should be the fierce wolf!
Let's go get it!

A baby!?
I see what's going on...

That wolf wants to protect its kid.
It's wounded, so it's so aggressive...

Humph, I see...
But the wolf bit people, we can't leave it alone...

Let's just heal its wounds, OK?
I think [px] can make medicine for it?

In that way, the wolf won't attack people, so we don't
have to kill it! Isn't it a good idea?

I see!
I've never seen you being this smart!

No, you're wrong!
I've always been this smart!

Come on, [px]!
We need to make medicine for the wolf ASAP!
